name: VReakout
description: VReakout is a modern re-imagining of the classic brick breaker genre with a virtual reality twist designed for the HTC Vive VR System.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Graphics: GTX 980+ Storage: 200 MB available space
